titleStmt.title: On the death of her illustrious grace Anne Dutchess-Dowager of Albemarle, who sickned with, and dyed twenty dayes after the Duke her husband; he the third of January, and she the twenty third of the same moneth, 1669.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Scarce had I breath'd the dukes elogium ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
